name: SSet.leftUnitor_hom_app_apply
initialProofState:
K : SSet
Δ : Opposite SimplexCategory
x : (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.tensorObj CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.tensorUnit K).obj Δ
⊢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.leftUnitor K).hom.app Δ x) x.2
decl:
@[simp]
lemma leftUnitor_hom_app_apply (K : SSet.{u}) {Δ : SimplexCategoryᵒᵖ} (x : (𝟙_ _ ⊗ K).obj Δ) :
    (λ_ K).hom.app Δ x = x.2 := rfl

name: SSet.leftUnitor_inv_app_apply
initialProofState:
K : SSet
Δ : Opposite SimplexCategory
x : K.obj Δ
⊢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.leftUnitor K).inv.app Δ x) { fst := PUnit.unit, snd := x }
decl:
@[simp]
lemma leftUnitor_inv_app_apply (K : SSet.{u}) {Δ : SimplexCategoryᵒᵖ} (x : K.obj Δ) :
    (λ_ K).inv.app Δ x = ⟨PUnit.unit, x⟩ := rfl

name: SSet.rightUnitor_hom_app_apply
initialProofState:
K : SSet
Δ : Opposite SimplexCategory
x : (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.tensorObj K CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.tensorUnit).obj Δ
⊢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.rightUnitor K).hom.app Δ x) x.1
decl:
@[simp]
lemma rightUnitor_hom_app_apply (K : SSet.{u}) {Δ : SimplexCategoryᵒᵖ} (x : (K ⊗ 𝟙_ _).obj Δ) :
    (ρ_ K).hom.app Δ x = x.1 := rfl

name: SSet.rightUnitor_inv_app_apply
initialProofState:
K : SSet
Δ : Opposite SimplexCategory
x : K.obj Δ
⊢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.rightUnitor K).inv.app Δ x) { fst := x, snd := PUnit.unit }
decl:
@[simp]
lemma rightUnitor_inv_app_apply (K : SSet.{u}) {Δ : SimplexCategoryᵒᵖ} (x : K.obj Δ) :
    (ρ_ K).inv.app Δ x = ⟨x, PUnit.unit⟩ := rfl

name: SSet.tensorHom_app_apply
initialProofState:
K K' L L' : SSet
f : Quiver.Hom K K'
g : Quiver.Hom L L'
Δ : Opposite SimplexCategory
x : (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.tensorObj K L).obj Δ
⊢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.tensorHom f g).app Δ x) { fst := f.app Δ x.1, snd := g.app Δ x.2 }
decl:
@[simp]
lemma tensorHom_app_apply {K K' L L' : SSet.{u}} (f : K ⟶ K') (g : L ⟶ L')
    {Δ : SimplexCategoryᵒᵖ} (x : (K ⊗ L).obj Δ) :
    (f ⊗ g).app Δ x = ⟨f.app Δ x.1, g.app Δ x.2⟩ := rfl

name: SSet.whiskerLeft_app_apply
initialProofState:
K L L' : SSet
g : Quiver.Hom L L'
Δ : Opposite SimplexCategory
x : (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.tensorObj K L).obj Δ
⊢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.whiskerLeft K g).app Δ x) { fst := x.1, snd := g.app Δ x.2 }
decl:
@[simp]
lemma whiskerLeft_app_apply (K : SSet.{u}) {L L' : SSet.{u}} (g : L ⟶ L')
    {Δ : SimplexCategoryᵒᵖ} (x : (K ⊗ L).obj Δ) :
    (K ◁ g).app Δ x = ⟨x.1, g.app Δ x.2⟩ := rfl

name: SSet.whiskerRight_app_apply
initialProofState:
K K' : SSet
f : Quiver.Hom K K'
L : SSet
Δ : Opposite SimplexCategory
x : (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.tensorObj K L).obj Δ
⊢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.whiskerRight f L).app Δ x) { fst := f.app Δ x.1, snd := x.2 }
decl:
@[simp]
lemma whiskerRight_app_apply {K K' : SSet.{u}} (f : K ⟶ K') (L : SSet.{u})
    {Δ : SimplexCategoryᵒᵖ} (x : (K ⊗ L).obj Δ) :
    (f ▷ L).app Δ x = ⟨f.app Δ x.1, x.2⟩ := rfl

name: SSet.associator_hom_app_apply
initialProofState:
K L M : SSet
Δ : Opposite SimplexCategory
x : (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.tensorObj (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.tensorObj K L) M).obj Δ
⊢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.associator K L M).hom.app Δ x) { fst := x.1.1, snd := { fst := x.1.2, snd := x.2 } }
decl:
@[simp]
lemma associator_hom_app_apply (K L M : SSet.{u}) {Δ : SimplexCategoryᵒᵖ}
    (x : ((K ⊗ L) ⊗ M).obj Δ) :
    (α_ K L M).hom.app Δ x = ⟨x.1.1, x.1.2, x.2⟩ := rfl

name: SSet.associator_inv_app_apply
initialProofState:
K L M : SSet
Δ : Opposite SimplexCategory
x : (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.tensorObj K (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.tensorObj L M)).obj Δ
⊢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.associator K L M).inv.app Δ x) { fst := { fst := x.1, snd := x.2.1 }, snd := x.2.2 }
decl:
@[simp]
lemma associator_inv_app_apply (K L M : SSet.{u}) {Δ : SimplexCategoryᵒᵖ}
    (x : (K ⊗ L ⊗ M).obj Δ) :
    (α_ K L M).inv.app Δ x = ⟨⟨x.1, x.2.1⟩, x.2.2⟩ := rfl
